summary: This mod prolongs the time after you\'ve died in the game, so you can watch the rest of the battle.
descriptionHtml:
This mod prolongs the time after you\'ve died in the game, so you can watch the rest of the battle - or watch yourself fall from a moutain... or other wierd stuff. Unfortunately I an unable to tweak the camera control after the player has died. 
You will have 10 minutes before the game reloads (that should be enough). 

It will not work in Real Life (tm). 

Enjoy!

__________

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19019]Lynges Better Destruction Tree Mod[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16913]Lynges Death Reload Time[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16914]Lynges No Loading Screen Text Mod[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16916]Lynges Real Arrows Mod[/url]
author: Martin Lynge
